MR150.title: Master Design (MR150)
MR150.domaine: Double domain in Science, Technology, Health & Arts, Literature, Languages
MR150.comment: The Master in Design of Cnam aims to train designers capable of contributing to reflective and transforming practices through projects in design, engineering and arts&crafts.

MR15001A.title: Master Design, specialty Création, projets, transdisciplinarité (MR15001A)
MR15001A.comment: The aim of this course is to develop critical thinking and practice aiming to helping to formulate and define the challenges of contemporary design.

ED546.title: Responsabilité de la spécialité Arts, Design et Société du doctorat Sciences humaines et humanités nouvelles (DOC7200A)
ED546.comment: This specialisation adheres with the CNAM's centuries-old tradition of crafts and technical professions, design and innovation, culture and creation, and with contemporary developments in these fields linked to the growing focus on social and ecological innovation both in France and internationally.

PoA.title: Perspectives on Aesthetics
PoA.comment: Creating one's own perspective on design and shaping a manifesto

PoA.title: Perspectives on Aesthetics
PoA.comment: Creating one's own perspective on design and shaping a manifesto

PoA.title: Perspectives on Aesthetics
PoA.comment: Creating one's own perspective on design and shaping a manifesto

DD.title: Design for Debate
DD.comment: Logic (and fallacies) and discourse in design

DfHN2.title: Designing for the Here and the Now 2

FItD.title: From Idea to Design
FItD.comment: Overview of the entire design process

DfHN.title: Designing for the Here and the Now
DfHN.comment: Exploration of the notion of affordance through prototyping

KD.title: Kansei Design: exploring values in experience
KD.comment: Application of Japanese notions in interaction design

voyage.title: A Voyage, provoking a cultural clash to inspire design
voyage.comment: Using a cultural clash as a source of inspiration for design

TET007-M1.title: Approche pratique du numérique et la recherche d'information (M1)
TET007-M1.comment: Introduction, installation and use of digital tools for digital practice and research and organization of information

MoT.title: Matter of Transformation
MoT.comment: How the interweaving between design, philosophy and human & social sciences impacts practices, societies and individuals

DfSI.title: Design for social innovation
DfSI.comment: Introducing the Transformative Practices Innovation framework for social innovation

Drituals.title: Designing (for) rituals
Drituals.comment: Exploration the complexity of nested temporality in interaction design through everyday rituals

DQI-theory.title: Designing Quality in Interaction (DQI) Theory
DQI-theory.comment: Introduction to theories and frameworks related to interaction design

Glow.title: Glow festival workshop
Glow.comment: Creation of an interactive installation for the GLOW light festival

SD.title: Sensual dynamics
SD.comment: Behaviour design based on perceptive qualities

SPD.title: Service Product Design
SPD.comment: Coaching projects and teaching tools for service design

DSN202.title: Pratiques réflexives en design, art et création
DSN202.comment: For a reflexive approach to situated practice, i.e. practice lived in a real context, this course provides tools from the fields of design for the transformative reflection of professional or everyday practices

DSN201.title: Research practices in design, art and creation
DSN201.comment: Overview and contextualisation of research practices in design, art and creation. It is about providing resources (knowledge, tools, methodologies, networks...) and putting them into practice

TET007-RNCP.title: Approche pratique du numérique et la recherche d'information (RNCP)
TET007-RNCP.comment: Digital literacy allowing to engage in information research and synthesis useful for professional life on the web

prospective-psychophysio.title: Prospective Psychophysiological Approach for Kansei Design
prospective-psychophysio.comment: Application of psychophysiology in interaction design

USEEK8.title: Projects for the international Master in Sciences, technologies, health - Telecommunications and Networks (MR14602A)
USEEK8.comment: Supervision of students' projects in design and engineering

TUe-coaching.title: Design project coaching
TUe-coaching.comment: Bachelor and Master levels at TU/e

ME310.title: Design thinking project coaching for ME310
ME310.place: École des Ponts ParisTech and d.school Paris, France
ME310.comment: Lecturing and supervising master-level design thinking projects
